title: Browse and View Chamber Details
description: Verify that a user can browse through the list of chambers, select a chamber, and view its detailed information including overview, events, members, and partners tabs.

steps.description: Navigate to the Chambers List page
Verify that list of bilateral and national chambers is displayed
Click on a chamber to view its detail page
Check chamber overview tab content is visible including description, logo, and contact info
Switch to the 'Events' tab
Verify upcoming events are displayed correctly
Switch to the 'Members' tab
Verify the member list of the chamber is shown properly
Switch to the 'Partners' tab
Verify the partners associated with the chamber are listed

title: Chamber Join Request Workflow
description: Verify that a user can request to join a chamber and that the membership status transitions from pending to approved upon admin validation, with corresponding badges displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to a chamber's detail page
Click the 'Join' button to request membership
Verify the membership request is created with status 'pending'
Simulate admin approval of the membership request
Confirm the user membership status changes to 'approved'
Check that the user's chamber membership badge reflects the approved status

title: Event Details Modal Loading with AJAX
description: Verify that when a user clicks on an event's 'View Details' button, a premium event details modal is dynamically loaded using AJAX and displays all event data accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to Events List page
Click 'View Details' on an event
Inspect the modal opens without full page reload
Verify modal displays correct event title, description, date/time, mode, location, max participants, and other details
Confirm modal includes up-to-date reservation status via API

title: Successful Event Reservation and Confirmation Flow
description: Verify that a user can reserve a spot for an event with available seats, confirm participation, and for online events, access the participation link after confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to an event with available seats
Click 'Reserve a Spot'
Verify reservation status is set to 'reserved'
Confirm participation from reservation
Verify reservation status changes to 'confirmed'
For online events, verify access link to online session is available

title: Event Reservation Failure when No Seats Available
description: Verify that when all seats are taken, attempting to reserve an event spot fails gracefully with an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to an event with zero available seats
Attempt to 'Reserve a Spot'
Verify the reservation is not created
Check that an error message indicates no seats are available

title: Event Cancellation Validations
description: Verify that a user can cancel a reservation only when the status is 'reserved', and cancellation is blocked after confirmation with relevant toast notifications.

steps.description: Make a reservation with status 'reserved'
Cancel the reservation
Confirm cancellation is successful and status is updated accordingly
Make a reservation and confirm participation (status 'confirmed')
Attempt to cancel the confirmed reservation
Verify cancellation is blocked and appropriate toast notification shown

title: Profile Photo Upload and Immediate Frontend Update
description: Verify that when a user uploads a new profile photo, it is previewed immediately, uploaded via AJAX, backend updates user records, and the new photo appears across all UI elements with success notification.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile photo upload section
Select a valid photo file
Verify the photo preview is displayed instantly
Trigger AJAX upload for the photo
Confirm backend updates the user's profile photo record
Verify all UI locations refresh to show the updated profile picture
Check that a success toast notification is displayed

title: User Profile Information Update
description: Verify users can update their profile information successfully and changes are persisted and reflected consistently across the platform.

steps.description: Access the profile update form
Modify profile fields (e.g. name, email, company)
Submit the update form
Verify backend updates the user data accordingly
Confirm updated information is reflected immediately in header, dashboard, and profile pages

title: Dashboard Displays Joined Chambers and Events with Statistics
description: Verify that the user dashboard correctly displays the chambers joined, events participated, upcoming bookings, and personal activity statistics with functional interactive links.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to user dashboard
Verify lists of joined chambers are shown
Verify events participated and upcoming bookings are displayed
Check personal statistics (e.g. chambers joined count, events attended) accuracy
Click on links to chambers and events from dashboard
Confirm navigation to respective detail pages

title: Exchange Rate Service Integration and Caching
description: Verify that bilateral chambers display live exchange rate information fetched from the ExchangeRateService with caching and error handling in place.

steps.description: Navigate to a bilateral chamber detail page
Verify exchange rates are displayed prominently
Confirm rates are fetched from ExchangeRateService API
Trigger multiple reloads within caching interval
Check that cached exchange rate data is used instead of new API calls
Simulate API failure or timeout
Verify fallback behavior and error message/notification to user

title: Member Approval Notification to Administrators
description: Verify that when a user requests to join a chamber, administrators receive proper notifications and can approve or reject membership requests via the admin panel.

steps.description: Submit a new join request for a chamber as a user
Verify admins receive notification of pending membership request
Admin logs into admin panel and navigates to membership requests
Admin approves the pending request
Confirm user membership status updates to 'approved' and notification sent to user

title: Responsive Design and Dark Mode UI Validation
description: Verify the web platform's UI adjusts properly across different screen sizes and toggling between dark and light modes applies correct styling and color schemes throughout all pages and components.

steps.description: Load the platform on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes
Verify layout and navigation adapt fluidly without visual defects
Toggle dark mode on
Verify all UI elements use appropriate dark mode colors and contrast
Toggle dark mode off
Verify UI returns accurately to light mode colors and styles

title: Forum Posting and Messaging Functionality
description: Verify that chamber members can create posts and send messages within the chamber forums, and that posts and messages display correctly with updated timestamps.

steps.description: Navigate to a chamber's forum as a member
Create a new forum post with valid content
Verify the post appears immediately in the thread with correct author and timestamp
Send a message within a forum discussion
Confirm message delivery and display in the message list

title: API Data Correctness for Event Details Endpoint
description: Verify the /api/events/{event}/details API endpoint returns complete and accurate event details including reservation status that match the UI representation.

steps.description: Send a GET request to /api/events/{event}/details for a known event
Verify the response contains correct event fields: title, description, date, time, mode, location, max participants, status
Confirm reservation status matches the user's actual reservation state
Check HTTP status code is 200 and response latency is within acceptable limits

title: Toast Notifications for Success and Error States
description: Verify that toast notifications appear for success and error events such as profile photo upload success, reservation failure, cancellation restrictions, and form validation errors.

steps.description: Perform a profile photo upload successfully
Verify success toast notification appears and disappears automatically
Attempt to reserve an event with no available seats
Confirm error toast notification is shown with meaningful message
Try to cancel a confirmed reservation
Verify error toast notification about inability to cancel displayed
Leave mandatory fields empty on profile update form and submit
Check validation error messages and toast notifications appear
